verbose_text: In conclusion, the results of the present study demonstrated that EA at the GV 20 and DU 24 acupoints may alleviate neurological deficits, reduce infarct volume and improve the learning and memory ability following cerebral I/R injury, possibly via enhancing the neurochemical metabolism of NAA and Cho in the HPC and FPC regions.
evidence: injury, possibly via enhancing the neurochemical metabolism
